short_summary: Request for Information - Greenhouse Gas Offset Credits
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 28 March 2024 at 14:00 EDT or EST.  This Request for Information (RFI) is seeking input from proponents of domestic offset projects, offset brokers, certifiers, traders or retailers in both compliance and voluntary markets. Also includes UNSPSC numbers 64111705 - Carbon credit permit or certificate, 64111707 - Renewable energy credit REC, 64141701 - Environmental mitigation credit, and 86101811 - Accreditation or re-accreditation service.
full_summary:
**Title: Request for Information**

**Request Ref.: WS4372412563**
**Solicitation No.: WS4372412563**
**Issued Date: January 04, 2024**
**Tender Closing Date: March 28, 2024, 2:00 PM EST**

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking input from proponents of domestic offset projects, offset brokers, certifiers, traders or retailers in both compliance and voluntary markets, through this Request for Information (RFI).

The RFI is aimed at gathering information on industry practices, market trends, and other relevant aspects that can help the PSPC make informed decisions regarding greenhouse gas offset credits.

**Eligibility and Requirements**

* All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by the specified tender closing date.
* Bidders must be proponents of domestic offset projects, offset brokers, certifiers, traders, or retailers.
* Relevant UNSPSC codes include:
	+ 77100000: Environmental management
	+ 77101500: Environmental impact assessment
	+ 77101501: Risk or hazard assessment
	+ 77101502: Environmental standards
	+ 78141502: Customs brokerage services
	+ 64111705: Carbon credit permit or certificate
	+ 64111707: Renewable energy credit REC
	+ 64141701: Environmental mitigation credit
	+ 86101811: Accreditation or re-accreditation service

**Trademarks and Agreements**

The Government of Canada's trade agreements that may be relevant to this tender include:

* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)

**Procurement Category**

This procurement falls under the service category.

**Contact Information**

For inquiries, please contact:

Justin O'Neil
SPAC/PSPC
Email: [justin.oneil@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:justin.oneil@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**
